system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Polarans are immune to cold environments. They do not have to make a Saving Throw against cold environments.
  • Polarans are weak to hot environments. The Fortitude Saving Throw to resist hot environments is doubled.
  • Polarans receive the extra feat Second Wind at 1st level for free, even if they do not meet the prerequisites

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Polarans are Medium sized creatures.

Physical Description

A healthy polaran typically stands between 5-6½’, and weighs between 130-180 lbs. The men and women are generally the same height. Polaran skin tone ranges from a pale flesh tone all the way to a snow white, and their hair ranges from a faint grey to bright white, with some possessing naturally blue hair, with silver and white being more common, almost exclusively straight and long. Eye color is also unique, ranging from a deep teal all the way to a deep dark blue, to assist in the snow. The average polaran lifespan is 110 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 17-22.

Language

The native language of a Polaran is Polar, but Trade Bant is an often taught language, for trade.

Names

Polarans have two names, The first name being a given name, and is used to refer to the particular polar, the second name being their family name, that denotes their immediate family.
